attributes.additional_details:
There is a growing problem with ID clones etc, but that is the governemnts repsonsiblilty, and should not fall on the public to constantly have to buy neqw forms of ID: Pass hologram, Provisional Drivers livense and now PAssports, just to be able to go out at night.

We, the undersigned, petition the governement to either provide a universally free acceptable form of ID, or to tackle ID theft andf clones in a way that does not null anymore currently acceptable forms.

We also petition them not to discriminate against non-drivers who can not afford the costs of driving simply to provide a full drivers license as acceptable ID for age restricted purchases.
